name: Hippotec
description:
Hippotec Ltd. is an outsourcing mobile applications development company (iOS and Android) providing state of the art development solutions for all requirements. Among our customers are hi-tech companies, ad agencies, startups, entrepreneurs, game developers, and more.
We offer our customers a wide range of services including spec and product design, UX/UI, graphic design, coding, integration, server-side development and many other services, performed by a highly experienced and professional team.
